font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 使不安，使混乱： upset, confuse
【例】 invent cool new ways to discombobulate the old order
【近】 upset, addle, baffle, bamboozle, befog, befuddle, confound, fuddle, gravel, muddle, muddy, mystify, perplex, puzzle, vex
【反】 compose, soothe, calm, pacify 使安定
